rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall featuring an elegant archway and natural lighting from skylights.
Expansive living area with large windows for abundant daylight; designed in accordance with Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Modern dining area integrated into the living space for fluid interaction between family members.
Functional kitchen with ergonomic design, efficient work triangle; natural ventilation and light ensured by overhead windows in keeping with local norms.
Luxury private gym area featuring high ceilings, ambient lighting, and ample space for exercise equipment; integrated with natural ventilation.
Open-plan studio apartment combining living, dining, and kitchen areas; designed to maximize space utility while ensuring privacy zones.
Modern bathroom with natural light from frosted windows; designed for convenience and ease of cleaning.
Compact storage space integrated within the studio apartment layout.

openings.details: Large entry door designed to invite positive energy per Vastu guidelines.
Balconies for the living room and studio area ensuring natural light and cross ventilation.
Multiple windows strategically placed across rooms to enhance natural lighting and comply with local building norms.
Skylights installed in central areas to maximize sunlight penetration into interior spaces.
